homepage.title: DevLovers ‚Äî Technical Interview Platform
homepage.subtitle: Platform for Technical Interview Preparation
homepage.welcomeDescription: Prepare for technical interviews with Q&A, quizzes, leaderboards, and AI-powered explanations.
homepage.description: Build real confidence in frontend, backend, and full-stack development through interactive interview questions, quizzes, and practical explanations

1.question: When should you actually use useMemo?
1.answer: Don't prematurely optimize! Use it only for expensive calculations or when passing objects as props to children wrapped in React.memo to prevent unnecessary re-renders.
1.tip: Overusing it can hurt performance due to dependency comparison overhead.

2.question: Why is "Event Delegation" better than direct binding?
2.answer: It attaches a single listener to a parent instead of thousands on children. This uses less memory and automatically handles dynamically added elements via event bubbling.
2.tip: Perfect for lists, tables, and infinite scroll feeds.

3.question: How does the Node.js Event Loop handle I/O?
3.answer: Node.js offloads I/O operations to the system kernel. When an operation completes, the kernel notifies Node.js, and the callback is added to the Poll phase to be executed.
3.tip: This is why Node.js is "non-blocking" despite being single-threaded.

4.question: Should you use SSR, SSG, or ISR?
4.answer: Use SSG for static blogs (fastest). Use SSR for personalized dashboards (freshest). Use ISR to update static pages incrementally without a full rebuild.
4.tip: Start with SSG/ISR by default for better performance.

5.question: Why use Generics in TypeScript?
5.answer: They let you write reusable code that works with any type while keeping full type safety. It's like function arguments, but for types.
5.tip: Commonly used in API wrappers, hooks, and utility functions.

productDescriptions.t-shirt-curve:
White Code-Heart Tee
A clean white T-shirt featuring the DevLovers code-heart symbol in bold black.
The high-contrast graphic gives it a sharp, modern look that works with jeans, joggers, or layered streetwear.
Simple, minimal, and easy to style for everyday wear.
productDescriptions.duck:
Team-lead duck in ‚Äújust one PR before sleep‚Äù mode: hoodie on, headset on, and a laptop covered in stickers so densely it could host its own DevOps.
The coffee cup says ‚ÄúTeam Lead‚Äù, a penguin intern sits nearby, and the duck has the exact look of someone who just said:
‚ÄúIt‚Äôs not a bug, it‚Äôs a feature‚Ä¶ but let‚Äôs still close it in this sprint.‚Äù
productDescriptions.hoodie-logo:
DevLovers Minimal Logo Hoodie (Graphite)
A clean, everyday hoodie with a subtle embroidered-style DevLovers chest mark. Designed for people who prefer low-key branding and a modern silhouette, this graphite piece fits effortlessly into any casual wardrobe.
Soft, practical, and easy to wear, it features a classic drawstring hood and kangaroo pocket‚Äîideal for work sessions, cool evenings, and daily layering.
productDescriptions.hoodie-graph:
DevLovers Blueprint Graph Hoodie (Off-White)
A clean, everyday hoodie with a bold back graphic: the DevLovers blueprint-heart design framed by code-style braces. The minimalist off-white base keeps it easy to pair with jeans, joggers, or layered streetwear looks.
Built for long workdays and weekend downtime, this hoodie gives a relaxed fit and a cozy feel without looking bulky. If you like subtle front styling and a statement back print, this is the one.
productDescriptions.hoodie-back:
DevLovers Binary Heart Hoodie (Black)
A clean black hoodie with a bold back print built from binary code and a DevLovers heart-in-braces symbol. Minimal from the front, statement from the back‚Äîmade for developers who like subtle style with strong identity.
Unisex relaxed fit
Soft everyday comfort
Drawstring hood
Kangaroo pocket
Large back graphic (binary + DevLovers symbol)
productDescriptions.hoodie-sketch:
DevLovers Blueprint Sketch Hoodie (Charcoal)
A clean, technical hoodie with the DevLovers signature blueprint-heart graphic on the front. The charcoal base and fine white linework give it a minimal, modern look that works on its own or layered.
Made for everyday wear, this hoodie combines a relaxed unisex fit with classic details: adjustable drawstring hood and a front kangaroo pocket.
productDescriptions.t-shirt-pink:
Pink DevLovers Tee ‚Äî {‚ô•} Graphic
A soft pink T-shirt with the signature {‚ô•} front print in a bold red/cyan offset style.
Clean, playful, and easy to pair with everyday outfits.
Great for casual wear, meetups, and gifting to your favorite developer.
productDescriptions.hoodie-black:
Black DevLovers Hoodie ‚Äî {‚ô•} Graphic
A clean black pullover hoodie featuring the signature {‚ô•} front print with a bold red/cyan offset effect.
It‚Äôs a standout everyday piece that blends minimal style with developer identity.
Perfect for casual wear, coding sessions, and cool-weather layering.
productDescriptions.stickers-set:
DevLovers Sticker Pack
Upgrade your setup with a bold set of dev-themed stickers.
This pack includes 9 unique {‚ù§Ô∏è} logo variations in clean monochrome and glitch-style designs, presented on one easy-to-use sticker sheet. A solid pick for laptops, notebooks, desk gear, and gift bundles.
9 distinct designs.
Mixed visual styles (classic, dark, glitch, textured).
Clean-cut shapes on a single backing card.
Made for developers, students, and tech fans.
productDescriptions.tee-graph:
DevLovers Math Graph Tee (Charcoal)
A minimalist charcoal T-shirt for people who love code, math, and clean design. The front print combines a plotted curve, parametric heart geometry, and formula-style notation with subtle code-brace details‚Äîtechnical, nerdy, and stylish without being loud.
productDescriptions.t-shirt-stereo:
Navy Glitch Code-Heart Tee
A deep navy T-shirt with a vibrant cyan-and-red glitch-style DevLovers code-heart graphic.
The color-shift effect adds motion and energy while keeping the design clean and centered.
Ideal if you want a stronger visual statement without losing a developer aesthetic.
productDescriptions.hoodie-blue:
DevLovers Glitch Heart Hoodie (Sky Blue)
A fresh sky-blue hoodie with a bold DevLovers braces-and-heart graphic in a glitch-inspired color offset. Clean silhouette, standout front print‚Äîmade for everyday wear with a tech-street vibe.
Unisex relaxed fit.
Soft, cozy fabric feel.
Adjustable drawstring hood.
Front kangaroo pocket.
Statement front graphic (glitch-style DevLovers heart).
productDescriptions.bottle-bl:
A sleek beige bottle featuring a bold black heart-in-braces graphic with cool neon cyan/blue highlights.
This version has a stronger, higher-contrast look that feels more edgy and tech-forward.
Ideal for anyone who wants practical hydration with a distinct developer aesthetic.

A bold purple T-shirt with a technical-art front graphic: a woven mesh sphere framed by code braces. It blends abstract 3D texture with developer aesthetics for a clean but standout look.
Unisex regular fit.
Large front statement print.
Lightweight everyday silhouette.
Easy to style with denim, joggers, or layered streetwear.
Great pick for dev/design fans who like minimal branding with strong visual detail.

Sleek DevLovers stainless-steel bottle with a clean silver finish, subtle code-inspired all-over print, and a bold vertical logo.
Its minimalist screw-cap design makes it a stylish everyday companion for work, study, and on-the-go hydration.

privacy.metaDescription: Learn how DevLovers collects, uses, and protects your personal data.
privacy.title: Privacy Policy

whoWeAre.title: 1. Who we are
whoWeAre.content: DevLovers is a platform for technical interview preparation. If you have questions about this policy, contact us at

dataWeCollect.title: 2. What data we collect
dataWeCollect.accountDataDesc: email, username, authentication identifiers, and related security metadata.
dataWeCollect.usageDataDesc: interactions with quizzes, results, progress, and basic telemetry needed to improve the service.
dataWeCollect.technicalDataDesc: device/browser information, IP address, logs, and error reports.

whyWeCollect.title: 3. Why we collect data
whyWeCollect.reason1: To provide secure authorization and account access.
whyWeCollect.reason2: To run quizzes, store results, and display progress/leaderboards.
whyWeCollect.reason3: To improve performance, reliability, and user experience.

cookies.title: 4. Cookies and similar technologies
cookies.content: We may use cookies/local storage to keep you signed in, store preferences (e.g. theme), and protect the service. If we add analytics cookies, this section will be updated.

sharing.title: 5. Sharing of data
sharing.content: We do not sell personal data. We may share limited data with trusted service providers (e.g. hosting, database, error monitoring) for strictly necessary DevLovers platform functionality.

retention.title: 6. Data retention
retention.content: We retain personal data only as long as needed for the purposes described above or as required by law.

rights.title: 7. Your rights
rights.content: Depending on your location, you may have rights to access, correct, delete, or export your data. For more information contact us at

gdpr.title: 8. GDPR compliance (EU users)
gdpr.intro: If you are located in the European Economic Area (EEA), you have additional rights under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR):
gdpr.rightAccessDesc: You can request a copy of your personal data.
gdpr.rightRectificationDesc: You can request correction of inaccurate data.
gdpr.rightErasureDesc: You can request deletion of your data ("right to be forgotten").
gdpr.rightRestrictionDesc: You can request limited processing of your data.
gdpr.rightPortabilityDesc: You can request your data in a machine-readable format.
gdpr.rightObjectDesc: You can object to processing based on legitimate interests.
gdpr.exerciseRights: To exercise these rights, contact us at

changes.title: 9. Changes to this policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy without notice. The latest version will always be available on this page.

terms.metaDescription: Read the terms and conditions for using the DevLovers platform.
terms.title: Terms of Service

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using DevLovers, you agree to these Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy.

accounts.title: 2. Accounts and authorization
accounts.content: When authorization is enabled, you may need an account to access certain features. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your credentials and for all activity under your account.

features.title: 3. Service features
features.feature1: Q&A content and interview preparation materials.

prohibited.title: 4. Prohibited use
prohibited.item1: Attempting to hack, disrupt, or bypass security/authentication mechanisms.
prohibited.item2: Scraping content at scale without permission.

ip.title: 5. Intellectual property
ip.content: DevLovers and its content are protected by applicable intellectual property laws. You may not copy, distribute, or reuse content beyond what is permitted for normal usage of the service.

disclaimer.title: 6. Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: DevLovers is provided "as is" without warranties. We do not guarantee that using the platform will result in employment.

liability.title: 7. Limitation of liability
liability.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, DevLovers will not be liable for indirect or consequential damages.

termination.title: 8. Termination
termination.content: We may suspend or terminate platform access if we reasonably believe you violated these Terms or abused the service.

changes.title: 9. Changes to terms
changes.content: We may update these Terms from time to time. The latest version will always be available on this page.
